content:

- 50mg: 23

### Events
- Central lab urine biomarker batch analysis completed for Week 22
- Cohort 25mg enrollment status reviewed at sponsor call

### Notes
- Week 22: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 87 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
